enjoy: Have fun answering our trivia and getting better scores!
updatesMonth: Every month we update the trivia questions!
hText: The objective of the game is to see how many questions you can answer correctly without making a mistake, there are a total of 6 categories, each category has a total of 50 questions.
answerText: The objective of the game is to get as many questions answered correctly, you can try as many times as you want, each category has a total of 50 questions that is 50 points that you can get.
competeText: You will compete against other users to see who is more skilled answering questions of a specific category, the score ranking will restart monthly with the update of questions.
rewardsText: The top 10 players will get a surprise reward, the rewards are given after the ranking and question reset.
conditions: TERMS OF SERVICE | PRIVACY POLICY | Â© 2018 EMERLIVE. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
sTitle: A champion is not afraid of losing.
sText: Show how much you know about sports trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
kTitle: Knowledge is not enough; we must apply it.
kText: Show how much you know about general knowledge trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
snTitle: Science is made of mistakes, but useful mistakes.
snText: Show how much you know about science and nature trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
aTitle: Art is not what you see, it is what you make others see.
aText: Show how much you know about art trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
anTitle: The loyalty of an animal knows no limits
anText: Show how much you know about animals trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
gTitle: He who seeks heaven on earth has fallen asleep in geography class.
gText: Show how much you know about geography trying to answer all our questions without making a mistake!
